```{r}
load("BayesProj.Rdata")
X <- dat$X
y <- dat$Y

sigma2_start 
beta_start
beta_sim
sigmaSim

Dinv <- diag(tauInv)
Ainv <- solve(t(X)%*%X + Dinv)
tauInv <- function(lambda,sigma2,beta){
  t1 <- sqrt((lambda^2*sigma2)/beta^2)
  return(rinvGauss(n = length(t1), nu = t1, lambda = lambda^2))
}
```
